description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 4). Nei is a skilled Heavy Metal pilot, and pilots the Heavy Metal Auge. She is often accompanied by her wingmen, Anton Rando and Heckler Mauser. Nei is also the lover of Elite 13 leader Giwaza Lowau. She makes numerous attacks on the rebels throughout the series.

Nei is sent to Gastogal by Giwaza in an attempt to prove Full Flat as a traitor, but Nei`s long stay there results in him abandoning his loyalty to her. While there she meets with Poseidal (Mian) and is ordered by her to assasinate Giwaza. Her assassination attempt ends in failure and he kills her.
name: Nei Mo Han
